texts.Resource:Name: Name
texts.VirtualPath:Name: Name
texts.Generic.Abp.FileManagement:000001: The file name cannot be empty.
texts.Generic.Abp.FileManagement:000005: Insufficient storage space.File size `{Value}` has exceeded `{Used}/{Max}`
texts.Generic.Abp.FileManagement:000006: Static folder cannot be moved or deleted.
texts.Generic.Abp.FileManagement:000007: Only move the public folder to the public folder.
texts.Generic.Abp.FileManagement:000008: Only move {Max} files and folders in one time,current number of files and folders is {Count}.
texts.Description:DefaultFileTypes: Default file types that can be uploaded. Separate multiple types with comma.
texts.Description:DefaultFileMaxSize: Default max file size in bytes, 0 means unlimited,mb,gb,tb can be used, e.g. 10mb, 1gb, 1tb.
texts.Description:DefaultQuota: Default quota in bytes, 0 means unlimited,mb,gb,tb can be used, e.g. 10mb, 1gb, 1tb.
texts.Description:StoragePath: Storage path, relative to the root path of the application.
texts.Description:TempPath: Temp path, relative to the root path of the application.
texts.Description:RetentionPeriod: The default retention period for the file
texts.Description:DefaultUpdateEnable: Whether to enable the default file update expiration time job.
texts.Description:DefaultUpdateRetentionPeriod: The default retention period for the file when updating the default file update expiration time job.
texts.Description:DefaultUpdateFrequency: The frequency of the default file update expiration time job, in seconds.
texts.Description:DefaultUpdateBatchSize: The size of the bulk operation when updating the default file update expiration time job.
texts.Description:DefaultCleanupEnable: Whether to enable the default file cleanup job.
texts.Description:DefaultCleanupFrequency: The frequency of the default file cleanup job, in seconds.
texts.Description:DefaultCleanupBatchSize: The size of the bulk operation when cleaning up the expired default files.
texts.Description:TemporaryUpdateEnable: Whether to enable the temporary file update expiration time job.
texts.Description:TemporaryUpdateRetentionPeri: The default retention period for the file when updating the temporary file update expiration time job.
texts.Description:TemporaryUpdateFrequency: The frequency of the temporary file update expiration time job, in seconds.
texts.Description:TemporaryUpdateBatchSize: The size of the bulk operation when updating the temporary file update expiration time job.
texts.Description:TemporaryCleanupEnable: Whether to enable the temporary file cleanup job.
texts.Description:TemporaryCleanupFrequency: The frequency of the temporary file cleanup job, in seconds.
texts.Description:TemporaryCleanupBatchSize: The size of the bulk operation when cleaning up the expired temporary files.
texts.Description:EnablePersonalFolderForRoles: Enable personal folder for roles, if enabled, users can create personal folders for their own use,otherwise they can only access public folders and shared folders with specific permissions.
texts.NoFilterAndFolderSelected: Please select a folder or input a filter.
